text: @fred_guttenberg @sharblom Exactly. Just stop covering Trump's RALLIES. He never really tell AMERICANS anything anyway just rattle on about himself and what a  good job he is doing and gave himself a 10. Just leave the briefings about the status of the coronavirus to the MEDICAL EXPERTS.
